game.description: In our latest quest, you must brave the depths of the haunted forest to recover the stolen artifact, known as the Eye of Eternity.
game.objective: Find and retrieve the Eye of Eternity.
game.quest_giver: Rumi the Wise, located in the central plaza of Dawnstar City.
game.reward: 5000 gold pieces and the Staff of Ages.

tasks.description: First, journey to the haunted forest, located in the southwest of Dawnstar City.
Search for the entrance to the hidden cave where the artifact is rumored to be located.
Within the cave, overcome any challenges and retrieve the Eye of Eternity.

game.title: Quest for the Eye of Eternity
